headline.main: Seal, Label and Poster Stamp Enrich the Collector's Field

lead_paragraph: Increasing in number in this time of war are seals, labels and poster stamps to meet all purposes, chiefly serving the cause of propaganda and charities. Collecting them is the hobby of thousands of persons in this country -- a hobby closely akin to philately because the mails are used to spread the "word" and perhaps also because the seals resemble stamps.
